name: Firebird (Haydenever)
description:
Explore lady Demian's twisted secrets in this end of Bachelor prototype: Firebird. (attention; this is not a game)

As the product of 3 years of learning in ISART Digital, discover our project: Firebird.

The goal was to build an entire 3D scene in which we can evolve, containing animations, interactions and all. Around this scene, we developed game design ideas along with an extended universe. While playing, imagine being in a horror Action-RPG, and finding yourself in such a setting. You will easily get our intentions, without a doubt.

As a team of 4 artists, the interactions and "gameplay" elements were made with some help from programmers but are rare, due to our lack of skills. Once the killzone is reached, there is no real end but you can consider yourself done with the sene!

Beware, the game plays in AZERTY!

GAME ARTISTS:

  • Léa Ménard - portfolio
  • Haydenever - portfolio
  • Coralie Gourjon - portfolio
  • Thibault Cavaroc
